name: Defective Detective
description:
Play as Detective Riddle, an officer of the law in 2076. A crime syndicate began crawling from the dark and reeking havoc in the street, and you're not the type to sit back and watch. Taking matters into your own hands, you fight your way through the anarchy to the Kingpin of the operation, take him down and end the chaos.

Gordon Ranger - Programmer/Level designer/Team Leader

Jack Kinoial - Programmer/Level Designer

Stephen Willadsen - UI Programmer, Sound Design Coordinator, Gameplay Programmer

Thomas Cox - Modelling and Animation, Music Coordinator

Jesse Nellis - Modelling and Animation Coordinator
